post.body: Ziet er leuk. Nice champagne!
In bed now.
Pretty simple, but to the point if all you need is an online biz card. Any plans for further development?
Your bank's New Year's resolution: Be one day ahead of the world and we'll never fall behind.
:D
Sounds like it -- even right now at 3:50a.
What happens if I'm already home?
As long as I'm saffely indoors. Yeah -- holla bayack!
Ah, yeah.
won't be seen at @JacobsWell this morning, due to his cold..Look for the two J's, though... BTW, Tim still needs a job: please contact him.
is sick, thank you very much.
thinks about his new blog design idea -- too many ideas, actually.
laughed at the http://is.gd/eqgu logo... Did no one see a pooping P (or a number of other inappropriate visuals) when this was designed?
is researching some ideas.
just had dinner with friends.
is going to try to take a nap now.
enjoyed the first sunrise of 2009!
was not fortunate to be able to sleep tonight.
just heard ann AK -- if his ears aren't deceiving him. (Could have bfeen an SKS with an *illegal* auto mod, I guess.)
thinks it's weird that the gun shots started at 9:15p tonight. Are the gangstas gettin' lazy, yo? Gotta love inner city livin'... Yo.
